00024 #define _LARGEFILE64_SOURCE
00025 #include <sys/types.h>
00026 #include <sys/stat.h>
00027 #include <sys/mman.h>
00028 #include <fcntl.h>
00029 #include <errno.h>

00031 #include <math.h>

00033 #include "local.h"
00034 #include "acq200_ioctl.h"

00037 
00038 #define BUFLEN  0x400000        /* @@todo read from device */
00039 #define TIMEOUT 50              /* @@todo ticks. should be msec. */
00040 
00041                                 /*         but that needs dvr chg. */
00042 
00043 #define INITIAL_TIMEOUT (24*3600*100)
00044 
00045 #define REVID "$Revision: 1.8 $ B1000"
00046 
00047 
00048 int SLOT = 3;
00049 int acq200_debug = 0;
00050 int timeout = TIMEOUT;
00051 int MAXTO = 60;                 /* max timeout retries */
00052 int SLEEP_WORK = 0;
00053 
00054 struct DeviceMapping {
00055         int fd;
00056         void *pbuf;
00057         char id[8];
00058 };
00059 
00060 struct FILE_INFO {
00061         char format[128];
00062         char fname[128];
00063         unsigned maxfile;
00064         unsigned nfiles;
00065         int ifile;
00066         int fd;
00067 }
00068         G_file = {
00069                 .maxfile = 0x80000000U,
00070                 .nfiles = 10,
00071                 .fd = -1
00072         };
00073 
00074 static struct DeviceMapping bufAB[2] = {
00075         [BUFFERA] = {
00076                 .id = "bufA"
00077         },
00078         [BUFFERB] = {
00079                 .id = "bufB"
00080         }
00081 };
00082 
00083 
00084 static void initMapping(struct DeviceMapping *mapping, int slot)
00085 {
00086         char fname[128];
00087 
00088         sprintf(fname, "/dev/acq200/acq200.%d.%s", slot, mapping->id);
00089 
00090         mapping->fd = open(fname, O_RDWR);
00091         if (mapping->fd < 0){
00092                 err("failed to open %s ", fname);
00093                 perror("open");
00094                 exit(errno);
00095         }
00096 
00097         mapping->pbuf = mmap(0, BUFLEN, 
00098                                 PROT_READ|PROT_WRITE, 
00099                                 MAP_PRIVATE|MAP_NONBLOCK, 
00100                                 mapping->fd, 0);
00101 
00102         if (mapping->pbuf == MAP_FAILED){
00103                 err("mmap() failed");
00104                 perror("mmap");
00105                 exit(errno);
00106         }
00107 }
00108 
00109 static void checkWork(int index, int len)
00110 {
00111         FILE *fp = popen("md5sum", "w");
00112 
00113         dbg(1, "index %d len %d", index, len);
00114         fwrite(bufAB[index].pbuf, 1, len, fp);
00115 
00116         pclose(fp);
00117 }
00118 
00119 
00120 
00121 static void fileOpen(int len)
00122 {
00123         char fname[128];
00124         if (G_file.fd != -1 ){
00125                 off_t fp = lseek(G_file.fd, 0, SEEK_CUR);
00126                 if (fp + len < G_file.maxfile){
00127                         return;
00128                 }else{
00129                         close(G_file.fd);
00130                 }
00131         }
00132 
00133         sprintf(G_file.fname, G_file.format, G_file.ifile);
00134         G_file.fd = open(G_file.fname, 
00135                                 O_WRONLY|O_CREAT|O_TRUNC|O_LARGEFILE, S_IRWXU);
00136         
00137         if (G_file.fd <= 0){
00138                 perror("failed to open file");
00139                 err("FATAL open failed:%s", fname);
00140                 exit(-1);
00141         }
00142 
00143         if (++G_file.ifile > G_file.nfiles){
00144                 G_file.ifile = 0;
00145         }
00146 }
00147 
00148 static void fileWork(int index, int len)
00149 {
00150         dbg(1, "%s: index %d len %d", G_file.fname, index, len);
00151         fileOpen(len);
00152         write(G_file.fd, bufAB[index].pbuf, len);
00153 }
00154 
00155 static void defaultWork(int index, int len)
00156 {
00157         
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00161 static void sleepWork(int index, int len)
00162 {
00163         dbg(1, "%d", SLEEP_WORK);
00164         usleep(SLEEP_WORK);
00165 }
00166 
00167 void (* doWork)(int index, int len) = defaultWork;
00168 
00169 static int action() {
00170         struct BufferAB_Ops ops = {
00171                 .ci.timeout = INITIAL_TIMEOUT
00172         };
00173         int next = BUFFERA;
00174         char status[80];
00175         unsigned long long total = 0;
00176         int syscalls = 1;
00177         int timeouts = 0;
00178 #define FD bufAB[BUFFERA].fd
00179         int started = 0;
00180 
00181 
00182         dbg(1, "timeout %d", ops.ci.timeout);
00183 
00184         initMapping(bufAB+0, SLOT);
00185         initMapping(bufAB+1, SLOT);
00186 
00187 
00188         for(; 1; syscalls++, ops.ci.timeout = timeout){
00189                 int rc = ioctl(FD, ACQ200_BUFFER_AB_IOWR, &ops);
00190                 char *sp = status;
00191 #define SPRINTF(fmt, arg...) do { sp += sprintf(sp, fmt, ##arg); } while(0)
00192 
00193                 if (rc >= 0){
00194                         if (acq200_debug && timeouts != 0){
00195                                 SPRINTF("\n");                          
00196                         }
00197                         timeouts = 0;
00198                         started = 1;
00199                 }else if (rc == -ETIMEDOUT){
00200                         if (acq200_debug){
00201                                 fputc('.', stderr); fflush(stderr);
00202                         }
00203                         if (started && ++timeouts >= MAXTO){
00204                                 perror("TIMEOUT?");
00205                                 return rc;
00206                         }else{
00207                                 continue;
00208                         }
00209                 }else{
00210                         err("ioctl(ACQ200_BUFFER_AB_IOWR) %d (signal)", rc);
00211 //                      return rc;
00212                         continue;
00213                 }
00214                 
00215                 ops.ci.recycle = 0;
00216 
00217                 SPRINTF("%8d:", syscalls);
00218                 if (ops.ds.full&BUFFER_FLAG_LUT[next]){
00219                         total += ops.ds.len[next];
00220                         SPRINTF("N:%d %8d %8d :", next, 
00221                                         ops.ds.sid[next], ops.ds.len[next]);
00222                         ops.ci.recycle |= BUFFER_FLAG_LUT[next];
00223 
00224                         doWork(next, ops.ds.len[next]);
00225 
00226                         next = !next;
00227 
00228                         if (ops.ds.full&BUFFER_FLAG_LUT[next]){
00229                                 total += ops.ds.len[next];
00230                                 SPRINTF("..");
00231                                 SPRINTF("N:%d %8d %8d :", next, 
00232                                         ops.ds.sid[next], ops.ds.len[next]);
00233                                 ops.ci.recycle |= BUFFER_FLAG_LUT[next];
00234                                 doWork(next, ops.ds.len[next]);
00235 
00236 
00237                                 next = !next;
00238                         }
00239                 }
00240                 dbg(1, "%s", status);
00241 
00242                 if (ops.ds.full&FULL_EOF){
00243                         break;
00244                 }
00245         }
00246 
00247         fprintf(stderr, "Total bytes: %Lu\n", total);
00248 
00249         return 0;
00250 }
00251 
00252 
00253 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00254 {       
00255         if (getenv("ACQ200_DEBUG")){
00256                 acq200_debug = atoi(getenv("ACQ200_DEBUG"));
00257         }
00258         if (getenv("ACQ200_CHECKWORK")){
00259                 doWork = checkWork;
00260         }
00261         if (getenv("ACQ200_SLEEP_WORK")){
00262                 SLEEP_WORK= MAX(atoi(getenv("ACQ200_SLEEP_WORK")), 1);
00263                 doWork = sleepWork;
00264         }
00265         if (getenv("ACQ200_TIMEOUT")){
00266                 timeout = atoi(getenv("ACQ200_TIMEOUT"));
00267         }
00268         if (getenv("ACQ200_SLOT")){
00269                 SLOT = atoi(getenv("ACQ200_SLOT"));
00270         }
00271         if (getenv("ACQ200_MAXTO")){
00272                 MAXTO = atoi(getenv("ACQ200_MAXTO"));
00273         }
00274         if (getenv("ACQ200_WRITEFILE")){
00275                 strcpy(G_file.format, getenv("ACQ200_WRITEFILE"));
00276                 if (strstr(G_file.format, "%") == 0){
00277                         strcat(G_file.format, ".%03d");
00278                 }
00279                 if (getenv("ACQ200_MAXFILE")){
00280                         G_file.maxfile = strtoul(getenv("ACQ200_MAXFILE"),0,0);
00281                 }               
00282                 if (getenv("ACQ200_NFILES")){
00283                         G_file.nfiles = atoi(getenv("ACQ200_NFILES"));
00284                 }
00285                 doWork = fileWork;
00286         }
00287 
00288         info("htstream %s slot %d", REVID, SLOT);
00289 
00290         return action();
00291 }
